summary.para: Contains information about header control text filters.

blockquote.para: [!NOTE] The commctrl.h header defines HD_TEXTFILTER as an alias which automatically selects the ANSI or Unicode version of this function based on the definition of the UNICODE preprocessor constant. Mixing usage of the encoding-neutral alias with code that not encoding-neutral can lead to mismatches that result in compilation or runtime errors. For more information, see Conventions for Function Prototypes.

summary.para: A pointer to the buffer containing the filter.
A value specifying the maximum size, in characters, for an edit control buffer.
